mapper.insert: INSERT into tbl_strategy_crontab_sell ( crontab_id, time , share , net_worth , amount , rate , end_time ) VALUES ( #{crontabId}, #{time}, #{share}, #{netWorth}, #{amount}, #{rate}, #{endTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT crontab_id , sum(amount) as amount_sum, sum(share) as share_sum FROM tbl_strategy_crontab_sell where crontab_id = #{crontabId} GROUP BY crontab_id limit 0,1
